trans-unit.source: Provides the system implementation for displaying a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
The ContextMenuService class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuService 클래스는 모양 및 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 위치를 지정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 연결 된 속성을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Many of the properties in the ContextMenuService class are also defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuService 클래스에서 속성 중 상당수에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> 정의 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the ContextMenuService class than by setting the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 경우에 따라 것이 더 편리 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> 속성을 설정 하 여 보다 ContextMenuService 클래스를 사용 하 여 속성을 설정 하려면

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> to be shared by multiple elements, but use the ContextMenuService class to specify a different position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> for each element.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 만들 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>여러 요소에서 공유할 수 있지만 ContextMenuService 클래스 사용의 다른 위치를 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>각 요소에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and ContextMenuService classes.
If any of these properties are set on both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and the ContextMenuService, the property value from the ContextMenuService is used.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다에서 이러한 속성 중 하나라도 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>속성 값을는 ContextMenuService ContextMenuService 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> You can also use the ContextMenuService to display menus on disabled items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A>사용할 수 없는 항목에 메뉴를 표시 하는 ContextMenuService을 사용할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>

The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Object to query concerning whether it has a drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 그림자가 있는지 여부를 관련 된 쿼리할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value, **true** if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> has a drop shadow; **false** otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 부울 값입니다. **true** 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> 에 그림자; **false** 그렇지 않은 경우.
